SchedulingAdherenceDetail.name: SchedulingAdherenceDetail
SchedulingAdherenceDetail.description: Represents the breakdown of daily shift adherence data by agent status.

IsShrinkage.description: Indicates if the linked status is considered as shrinkage time (true) or not (false). Shrinkage time is time, such as breaks, when an agent doesnâ€™t receive work.

Name.description: A number that identifies this detail record.

SchedulingAdherenceSummaryId.description: The ID of the Scheduling Adherence Summary.

StatusId.description: The ID of the agent status represented by this detail record.

StatusName.description: The name of the agent status represented by this detail record.

TotalStatusMinutes.description: Total minutes that the agent was present with this status.

SchedulingAdherenceDetail.accessRules: a Workforce Engagement license, and both Workforce Engagement and Omni-Channel must be enabled
